properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 12 at 3:21PM EST until February 13 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Cleveland OH
properties.description:
...Wintry Mixed Precipitation This Evening Through Thursday
Morning...

.Low pressure over the Mid-Mississippi Valley region will move
quickly northeast towards the Upper Ohio River Valley region
tonight. The storm system will bring mixed precipitation to the
area and will cause difficult travel conditions lated Wednesday
evening through Thursday morning.

* WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations
of 3 to 5 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze.

* WHERE...Erie and Crawford Counties in Pennsylvania.

* WHEN...From 4 PM this afternoon to 10 AM EST Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous
conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Precipitation will likely start as snow
this evening. The precipitation could be of moderate to briefly
heavy intensity at times in the evening. Then, a brief period
of a wintry mix with freezing rain is then possible later in the
evening and overnight before transitioning back to all snow
early Thursday morning.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

The Pennsylvania Department of Transportation and Pennsylvania
Turnpike Commission remind motorists to adjust speeds based on
driving conditions as winter weather impacts Pennsylvania
roadways. Visit www.511pa.com for the latest travel, roadway, and
traffic conditions.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST THURSDAY
